title: Summa Health Medical Group Family Medicine
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. John M Weeman, MD - Barberton, OH - Internal Medicine
cleaned_text: John M Weeman, MD Internal Medicine Locations Summa Health Medical Group Family Medicine Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine About John M Weeman As an internal medicine specialist, John Weeman, M.D., has special interests in adult internal medicine, preventive medicine, management of chronic disease, and procedural simulation. He has made it his goal to deliver accessible, expert care to each of patients. Dr. Weeman is a graduate of the University of Toledo College of Medicine. He completed an internship and a residency with the Summa Health System/Northeast Ohio Medical University Program in internal medicine, as well as with the Mayo Clinic College of Medicine and Science (Jacksonville) Program in general surgery. Expertise Education Summa Health System Residency, Internal Medicine, 2021 University of Toledo College of Medicine Medical School Mayo Clinic Residency, General Surgery, 2016 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health. These patient survey scores are noted here and updated on a monthly basis. Insurance Note: This is not an all-inclusive list of health plans. Additional health plans may be accepted. Please contact your insurance provider for confirmation. - Buckeye (Ambetter Product) - Buckeye Advantage (Medicare Product) - Buckeye Medicaid - ChoiceCare - Cofinity - Direct Care America - Emerald Health Network - First Health Network - HealthSmart - Humana Commercial
